abstract: MySpace will make it easy to take photos and information from your MySpace profile and display it on profile pages of other Web sites. This is a more useful approach to sharing than the one taken by Facebook, which keeps most activity on its own site.
snippet: MySpace will make it easy to take photos and information from your MySpace profile and display it on profile pages of other Web sites. This is a more useful approach to sharing than the one taken by Facebook, which keeps most activity on its own s...
lead_paragraph: Amid all the initiatives in which Internet companies are supposed to make friends with one another — like Facebook’s Platform and Google’s rival OpenSocial initiative — the announcement Thursday by MySpace may well be the most useful to ordinary people and thus the most important.

headline.main: MySpace Turns Social Network Sharing in the Right Direction
